title: Falling
description: Safety is an illusion. When the world crumbles into chaos, only a chosen few can afford the luxury of life in towers built to soar far above the pollution and destruction on the ground. Life up in the air is full of beautiful things and beautiful people. What happens when you-re not one of them? What happens when everything you believed about the world turns out to be a lie?You fall. Or you learn how to fly...
author: Imogen Howson
